definition: to assail the nostrils (of fragrance and odors)
to snort disdainfully/to scoff at/to turn up one's nose
the earliest ancestor/originator (of a tradition, school of thought etc)
the wing of the nose/ala nasi
cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)

sentences.english: Most animals walking on four legs have long muzzles.
sentences.chinese: 大多數用四肢走路的動物口鼻部分都相當長。

sentences.english: The nose must be clearly in front of the vertical.
sentences.chinese: 馬鼻必須明顯的在垂直線的前方。

sentences.english: A bulb syringe is often used for oral and nasal suction on infants and children .
sentences.chinese: 常常使用球吸引器抽吸嬰幼兒的口鼻。

sentences.english: The nasal vaccine, called FluMist, is made of an attenuated live virus.
sentences.chinese: 稱作流感噴霧的鼻噴霧疫苗由經稀釋的活病毒製成。

sentences.english: Use saline nasal spray as directed throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 按指導用生理鹽水製成鼻噴霧，全天使用。

sentences.english: Nasal lavage carries few risks when performed correctly.
sentences.chinese: 鼻灌洗進行一些風險，正確執行。

sentences.english: His face was squarish with a high forehead heavy jaw and broad nose.
sentences.chinese: 他一章方臉上嵌着高額頭，粗大的下顎和蒜頭鼻。

sentences.english: Cindy:He let out a sigh of relief when he found out the baby was a brother.
sentences.chinese: 當他知道小北鼻是弟弟時，還鬆了一口氣呢。

sentences.english: Results The commonest clinical manifestation was nasal obstruction and exophthalmos.
sentences.chinese: 結果主要臨牀表現爲鼻堵及眼突。

sentences.english: The horse snorted  and shied at the train.
sentences.chinese: 那匹馬被火車嚇得直噴鼻連連倒退。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce a new method of septal cartilage augmentation for hump nose plasty.
sentences.chinese: 目的介紹用鼻中隔軟骨充填整復駝峯鼻的方法。

sentences.english: Inhale deeply through your nose, then exhale quickly and forcibly, also through your nose (or pursed lips).
sentences.chinese: 用鼻深吸氣，然後用鼻或撅起嘴脣使勁並快速的呼出。

sentences.english: Inhale deeply through your nose, then exhale quickly and forcibly, also through your nose (or pursed lips).
sentences.chinese: 用鼻深吸氣，然後用鼻或撅起嘴脣使勁並快速的呼出。

sentences.english: The nomenclatures of the lateral nasal artery and the dorsal nasal artery were researched.
sentences.chinese: 對鼻外側動脈和鼻背動脈的命名問題提出了商榷。

sentences.english: Fish with long tubular snout and slim body covered with bony plates.
sentences.chinese: 長有管狀口鼻，細長的身體表面覆蓋有骨盤。

sentences.english: Endoscopic technique is an ideal way in the treatment of nasal bone fracture.
sentences.chinese: 鼻內鏡技術是治療鼻骨骨折較爲理想的方法。

definition: the wing of the nose/ala nasi
